ABOUT_SLIDE_1_PHRASE_1: to create a global platform where people help each-other to find good health care
ABOUT_SLIDE_1_PHRASE_2: to enable all people to share their good experiences
ABOUT_SLIDE_1_PHRASE_3: to facilitate easy access to high quality care
ABOUT_SLIDE_1_PHRASE_4: to connect health care providers all over the world
ABOUT_SLIDE_1_PHRASE_5: to bring patients, insurers and providers closer together
ABOUT_SLIDE_2_PARAGRAPH_1: We are a self-funded company that does not belong to a large co-operation. We are real people with a real interst in helping others to find good care. With more than fifteen years of experience in the health care market we know how important it is to facilitate access to good care! YOU can make the difference by using the platform we have created and by sharing content with people around the world.
